attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it asked me for all my personal info so i put in all my info like my social Security number and stuff like that. Then i put in all my credit card info and it drained my accounts dont download its a scam.

attributes.title: Oh no honey
attributes.review: I read the description and in fine print I saw that it said that I would get a part in the office and I could meet Mathew gray Gubler. But like where are they??? Anyway I don’t like trump. Okay have a nice day I guess. (You still owe me a part in the office and some Mathew!)

attributes.title: Tik ToK
attributes.review: I went to the app and I opened it and I have to login and talk about privacy I don’t want mr.🍊 having my email or phone number and also I kinda don’t want to know about him probably because he is a racist hater he must have his own collection of hateraid ✨

attributes.title: MADE MY PHONE DIE
attributes.review: I am currently writing this on my laptop due to the fact that right when I downloaded it my phone glitches and won’t turn back on. Terrible app unless you have the newest phone on the market. Also OBAMA 2020

attributes.title: Omgg
attributes.review: 🧚‍♀️I can’t with this app, this app asked for my freaking bra size!!!!!!!!!! Then it asked if I wanted to give some cash to trump 2020! Like I love our president 🥰💞 .... but then I noticed when I opened the app is said trump was watching me take a SHOWER!!!!!! I then saw some writing on the walls and said some nasty stuff. THIS APP IS CREEPY 💫

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: This app just gives unnecessary info on trump. I downloaded this app hoping to learn more about trumps plans for the future, turns out it just has information that everyone knows. Very disappointed 😒

attributes.title: Super glitchy
attributes.review: This app is terrible! It made my phone so glitchy from the moment it was downloaded. My phone crashed 4 times while trying to use the app. Trump fan or not, DO NOT download this app. It isn’t safe for your phone.

attributes.title: This app is✨horrible✨
attributes.review: Worst app I have ever encountered! I kept having nightmares of the orange and his followers. And everytime I would try and actually read stuff the whole app would crash:( I was really looking forward to a great app for our ✨orange pedo✨. Um but anyways #dumptrump

attributes.title: Worm that Donald trump💩
attributes.review: So this app is so horrible is just full of racist ppl🥰and they have glitching problems😖😖that why u should move to TikTok 🤩😛#dumptrump2020 🥰🥰🥰🥰🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🙂🙂🙂🙂🙂🙂🙂😍wow this almost have me a get a panic attack and that no bueno, Apple this app is super bad is like dangerous to racist ppl and like I can track u and they kidnapped u 🤓🤓🤓byeeeee!!!!

attributes.title: DON’T RECOMMEND
attributes.review: 0/10 I highly do not recommend u get this app. Not even because it’s trump but because he is apart of the motion to ban tik tok. Tik tok is literally the only good thing going for us right now this year, so let’s show him & whoever else how it feels to get an app ban or cancelled. IT DOESN’T FEEL TO GOOD NOW DOES IT DONALD?!
